<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Gaze of Veracity](/Feats.aspx?ID=1084) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 85 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Hellknight Signifer](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=26)

**Prerequisites**
[Hellknight Signifer Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1082); ability to cast focus spells

</column>

---

You can channel your mask’s power to pierce through lies and see the truth in any situation. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1. While wearing your mask, you can cast the [_glimpse the truth_](/Spells.aspx?ID=425) cleric domain spell as a divine focus spell.
name: Gaze of Veracity
prerequisite: Hellknight Signifer Dedication; ability to cast focus spells
